column1: Masters in Applied Econometrics and Forecasting
column3: ISEG - Lisbon School of Economics and Management
column5: ObjectivesThe Masters in Applied Econometrics and Forecasting at ISEG - Lisbon School of Economics and Management aims to educate specialized staff of financial institutions, companies, and other public and private organizations that use the analysis and processing of data as a support for decision-making, as well as university professors and researchers.To this end, it aims to develop the ability to integrate theoretical and empirical knowledge critically and creatively, and to familiarize students with various IT programs for quantitative analysis.
